scripts.dump-households: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM households" > ./dumps/dump_households.json

scripts.dump-task_comment: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM task_comments" > ./dumps/dump_task_comments.json
scripts.dump-inventory: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM inventories" > ./dumps/dump_inventories.json
